title: Wonan
creator_contributor_role: Netherlands Association for Rehabilitation, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Netherlands - Social life and customs
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped - Rehabilitation
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Developmentally disabled children
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped - Care and treatment
description: One in a thousand people in Holland are handicapped. In rehabilitation centres they learn skills to assist them with day-to-day living but this is a long process. The needs of special home facilities required by the disabled person are discussed with the family so the individual can eventually become independent.
